https://tmrev.io/movie/741211-Devil's Road: The True Story of Ed and Lorraine Warren 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/k4BRj5pws4Jv1CixzWh8CWE4Sq4.jpg Over the course of their 50-year career, Ed and Lorraine Warren investigate thousands of hauntings. Some of their most famous cases include the Amityville Horror house and the real-life Rhode Island home behind "The Conjuring" films. Devil's Road: The True Story of Ed and Lorraine Warren
